successes.title: LIGHTFREQ:"The lovechild of Philips hue and Jambox" BOOM
successes.description: We just launched LightFreq Square2 on Indiegogo! Click here to upgrade or get yours today:

Pledges.description: HALL OF FAME - Thanks for your support! You will get all the updates on the project and exclusive video content! You'll have access to all the fun videos we are making first and will also list you in the credits on our website! Thanks for believing in us!
TURN IT UP - As thanks we will give you the soundtrack we used, (8 songs!)along with project updates and our awesome video content. You rock!

BETA PLAYER - You are one of those cool people that love playing around with apps before they are released and finding all the creases. We want to give you early beta access to help make sure that the LightFreq app is made for YOU in mind.
EARLY BIRD - We cannot thank you enough for your early support, and in thanks you will be one of the lucky few to catch a deal on your very own LightFreq and free app!
LIGHTFREQ - You receive one LightFreq to go along with the free LightFreq app, ready to start using within your home as soon as it arrives!

KICKSTARTER SPECIAL EDITION - We will give you the limited edition black matte LightFreq with the logo in Kickstarter green, along with the free LightFreq app, for those looking for something a bit fun and funky.
EARLY BIRD PAIR - This limited offer gives you a set of 2 LightFreqs to enjoy amazing light and sound in different rooms of your house, or in stereo in the same room, and the free LightFreq app!
2 LIGHTFREQS - Enjoy stereo sound with your 2 LightFreq lights in your home or business and a free download of the LightFreq app.

EARLY BIRD TRIO-  When you are looking to stock up the house only 3 LightFreqs will do! We will give you 3 LightFreq lights and the free LightFreq app to bring great sound and light to your home or business.

KICKSTARTER SPECIAL EDITION - We will give you a set of 2 limited edition black matte LightFreqs with the logo in Kickstarter green, along with the free LightFreq app, for those looking for something a bit fun and funky.
SET OF 2 LIGHTFREQ SQUARE2S- Feel the Rumble PAIR ! You will get a set of TWO LightFreq Square2s, enjoy amazing stereo sound, and Deeper Bass! And of course a free download of the app.
3 LIGHTFREQS -  Enjoy brilliant light and sound with your 3 new LightFreqs around the home or office, along with our awesome free app!
FAMILY OF 4 LIGHTFREQS: 4 LightFreqs to bring amazing light and sound to your home or business and free download of the app to control it all.
SET OF 6 LIGHTFREQS - Boom Boom shake the room! You get six LightFreqs and free download of the app to enjoy the best sound for your whole house!
4 LIGHTFREQ SQUARE2S- We Jamming Pledge! You will get 4 LightFreq Square2s, and free downloads of the app to control it all.

The Demand Pledge! We have been asked to have a pledge level of a SET OF 8 LIGHTFREQS - SO Boom Boom Boom shake the room! You get eight LightFreqs and free download of the app to enjoy the best sound for your whole house!
6 LIGHTFREQ SQUARE2S- House party pledge! You will get 6 LightFreq Square2s, this is perfect for a house party, and free downloads of the app to control it all.
SET OF 6 LIMITED EDITION LIGHTFREQS - Set of six limited edition matte black with Kickstarter green logo LightFreqs and free download of the app.

8 LIGHTFREQ SQUARE2S- School of ROCK pledge! Now thats crazy loud! You will get a set of 8 LightFreq Square2s, and free downloads of the app to enjoy the best sound and lighting in your whole house with amazing bass!

12 LIGHTFREQ SQUARE2S- Lets WAKE the Neighbors Pledge!  A SET OF 12 LightFreq Square2s, this my friends is going to provide louder, crisper, cleaner highs and mids, along with deeper tight bass. Throw these in party mode and get an amazing array of colors all controlled by our APP.
PERSONALIZE YOUR LIGHTFREQS - We will personalize your set of 6 LightFreqs with your company logo or a message to your loved one. Free app included of course!

HOUSE OF LIGHTFREQS - LightFreq will come to your house to deck it out in LightFreqs (up to 30)! And, you will get the awesome free app to control them all. You will have the best sounding and lighted house in the world. Queen Elizabeth need not apply as that is a lot of running around! (Flights not included)

BRING LIGHT AND SOUND TO YOUR BUSINESS - We will deck your independent business out with LightFreqs (up to 60) to bring the best light and sound to your company. Did we mention you also get the free app to set the mood? (Flights not included)
